Articles.Content: I make another hill. My hill and megatiger78's hill with space marines.

I bulldoze both hills, burying everyone in the hill.

My new hill.
I redefine the word "hill" as "the set of all things that belong to wossname, which includes the set of all sets and the word hill". Subsequent re-definitions are invalid.

space marines call the inquisition. BURN HERETIC, BURN!

my imperium of man
I go back in time and delete all things able to make hills and claim a dinosaur as "my hill".

I call upon the physics inquisition, to obliterate all in my path.....(so that's how the dinos died)

my shrub i call a hill
I set the shrub on fire are fire

The ashe3s are considered able to make a hill, so they get deleted.

my new vacume.

remember that master chief inside a dreadnought?

my hill.
I do not remember. my hill.

I push you down the side of it.

My hill.
I climb back up. my hill.
I push you down again. My hill.

I smash a train into your hill and proceed to build a train tunnel through the hill.

My tunnel.

I run a train through a tunnel and stop in it and claim it as mine.

My tunnel.
I derail the hype train my hill

Your hill was destroyed by a derailed hype train going through it.

My hype-contaminated rubble.

I dump a load of dirt on the rubble.

My hype contaminated rubble buried under a hill.

i punch YoetoJoe in the face and build a adamantium bunker on the hill, put a cloaking device around the entire hill, and place it somewhere in the core of duna.

i activate a forcefeild to keep the duna-core heat out.

i put nuclear missile silos all over the surface of duna.

my cloaked, forcefield-surronded impenetrable adamantium bunker built on a pile of hype-contaminated rubble buried under a hill somewhere inside duna.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T17:00:41Z" title="04/20/2015 05:00  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**
I teleport in. my cloaked, forcefield-surronded impenetrable adamantium bunker built on a pile of hype-contaminated rubble buried under a hill somewhere inside duna.

i teleport in to \*my\* bunker, throw you out of the airlock, and install a teleport-jammer.

i also move it to somewhere inside the sun.

i put lots of defense what-not in low sun orbit.

my cloaked, forcefield-surronded impenetrable adamantium bunker with teleport jammers built on a pile of hype-contaminated rubble buried under a hill somewhere inside kerbol.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-20T17:54:33Z" title="04/20/2015 05:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 20, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**

I buy a Death Star (only 999999999999999999999999999999999999999999$Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â£Ã‚Â¥)

blow up Duna 

my deathstar star with no stupid holes for people to blow up

I happen to fire a projectile down the exhaust shaft.

My debris in space.
I said no stupid holes for people to blow up that means no exhaust shafts or trenches or direct acces to its core or indirect for that matter

I strap a nuclear bomb to the side and blow it up, which creates a large hole in the side. I detonate another bomb inside the hole, destroying the entire station. I make a new space station.

My space station.
